mapper.update: update sys_province set province_name = #{provinceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province_order = #{provinceOrder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, valid_flag = #{validFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time_stamp = #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, rec_stat = #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where province_code = #{provinceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select province_code, province_name, province_order, valid_flag, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from sys_province where province_code = #{provinceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select province_code, province_name, province_order, valid_flag from sys_province ORDER BY province_order + 0
